name: Rogues or Heroes
description: Rogues or Heroes is a dungeon crawler where the difficulty depends on your choices. With procedurally generated levels and fearsomes bosses, Rogues or Heroes is a top-down dungeon crawler with fast paced action proposing a certain challenge. Play alone or with a friend, in lan or online co-op.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 540M Storage: 900 MB available space
